#HMAC test vectors
#Sources:
#https://raw.githubusercontent.com/coruus/nist-testvectors/master/csrc.nist.gov/groups/ST/toolkit/documents/Examples/HMAC_SHA384.txt
#https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4868#section-2.7
#Key length = 384 bits, Block length = 1024 bits, Tag length = 384 bits
